thread.section_title: Hotel Newton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute little Hotel
thread.title_full: Cute little Hotel - Review of Hotel Newton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TravelWII
title: Cute little Hotel
text: First of all, the location is just right. Within steps are plenty of shoppes, restaurants and things to do. The hallways could be lit a bit more, they seemed very dark for a hotel. The rooms are very NYC size, very small. The only complaint I had was there is NO heat control and the room was WAY TO HOT! I had to leave the window open all night to cool down the room. The Check In/Out process was very easy and the employees all seemed very nice! For travelers looking for a clean room with decent rates, Hotel Newton fit the bill!
